channel.title: [pi] 317 [pi]
channel.description: Need help with a jail system, i have added one manually to the server from the files playerassist,player,client,commands. i had 2 broblems i fixed first one where you can just tele out of the jail when u are jailed, but now when i jail someone they cant tele but if they log out they can just tele out. how do i make it where there perm jailed even if they log?

item.title: [pi] 317 [pi]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Add a token to their save file, so the server will load if the player is in jail or not.

Read full topic
